headline: Alliant Energy’s (LNT) $725 Million Notes Offering Might Change the Case for Financial Flexibility
summary: Alliant Energy Corporation recently completed a US$725 million public offering of fixed-to-floating rate junior subordinated unsecured notes due April 1, 2056, with proceeds intended for debt reduction and general corporate purposes. This move provides Alliant Energy with added financial flexibility and is viewed as a proactive step to enhance the company’s debt structure. We'll explore how Alliant Energy's large subordinated notes issuance could affect its investment case, especially...
